Local recordings are studio-quality, individual audio and video recordings of each participant, recorded directly on the device.
This allows for high-quality, freeze-free recordings regardless of internet connection.
Useful for post-production editing!

To learn more about local recording, click here.

You can now edit the title of your past live streams and recordings in the videos tab. Now you don't have to come up with the perfect title before your stream!

To edit a video title, click on the Videos Tab, then click on the 3 dots of the video you want to edit, and select 'edit title'. Enter a new title, then click save. Now you're ready to share your video!

For Business users, video clips 📼 can now be up to 60 minutes in length, and 1.2GB in size!

This allows easily uploading long-form videos to show on-stream.
Video clips are saved to StreamYard, and are available to any users co-host and above in the workspace.

More information on video clips and how to use them is available here.
items.title: Longer Video Clips üìº
items.summary: For Business users, video clips üìº can now be up to 60 minutes in length, and 1.2GB in size! This allows easily uploading long-form videos t...

items.content_html:
Video clips will now show their remaining time!

Hosts/Admins/Cohosts will see a numeric countdown on the video clip in the Brand tab, showing when the video will end.
Both Hosts and Guests will also see a blue progress bar under the video while it plays.
These are only visible locally, and do not show up on the stream itself.
items.title: Time Remaining for Video Clips üïê
items.summary: Video clips will now show their remaining time! Hosts/Admins/Cohosts will see a numeric countdown on the video clip in the Brand tab, showin...

items.content_html:
You can now hide private chat message popups while the stream is fullscreen! 📄
This allows you to share a clean, un-obstructed view of the stream to a 2nd display, projector, or to another application.

To hide the chat message popups, once fullscreen just click "Hide Chat" at the bottom right of your screen.

items.content_html:
You can now share multiple camera angles in your stream: easily switch between the two cameras, or show both at the same time! Here's how to use it.

Available on the Professional plan.

items.content_html:
You can now collapse brand sections to save space on-screen! 📁
Just click the "v" down arrow to collapse a section.

items.summary: You can now collapse brand sections to save space on-screen! üìÅ Just click the "v" down arrow to collapse a section.

items.content_html:
StreamYard now has more built-in backgrounds to choose from!
Click "Add background" in the Background section of the Brand tab to get started.

items.content_html: StreamYard now has built-in background music! 🎶 Use our royalty-free songs to add some ambiance to your streams, or to keep the flow during an intermission. Here's how to use it in your next stream!

items.content_html:
StreamYard now has the option to crop the solo layout!
Got a fancy background graphic? Show it off in your stream behind your camera feed!
See how to enable the cropped solo layout here.

StreamYard now has starred comments! ⭐
If you get a lot of comments on your streams, star important comments to save them for later.
Here's how to star comments on your stream.

Replace your camera's background with any image, with or without a greenscreen!
Here's how to use virtual backgrounds.

Share PowerPoint presentations, PDFs, and more!

items.content_html:
StreamYard now supports 6 more languages! 🌎

  • Français / French
  • Italiano / Italian
  • Deutsch / German
  • Tiếng Việt / Vietnamese
  • 日本国 / Japanese
  • ภาษาไทย / Thai

For more info on StreamYard's language support, and how to change your language, see here.here

StreamYard Teams is now released! 🤝
Invite team members or cohosts, and easily collaborate on broadcasts!
For more information on StreamYard teams, see here.

items.content_html:
StreamYard now has built-in hotkeys! ⌨
Control your camera & mic, change layouts, share videos and more, all with keyboard shortcuts!
Here's how to set up and use hotkeys in StreamYard.

(Bonus: You can also now use the Elgato StreamDeck with StreamYard! See our pre-built template and how to here.)

items.content_html:
StreamYard now supports displaying all comments from a stream!
Get a lot of comments and interaction on your streams?
No problem! Keep scrolling through comments, and they will be dynamically loaded from your destinations.

items.content_html:
StreamYard now records 6 hours per stream (up from 4) on Basic, and 10 hours per stream (up from 8) on Pro!

Additionally, StreamYard now has an easy-to-use video library for viewing your recordings! 📺
Click "Videos" on the left side of the StreamYard dashboard to get started.

items.content_html:
StreamYard has a new layout!
Show your camera overlaid on top of a screen share, video, or presentation with the PIP (picture-in-picture) layout!
Here's how to use the PIP layout in your next stream.

You can also now select multiple files when uploading assets (logos/overlays/backgrounds/video clips) to the Brand tab!

items.content_html:
Prerecorded broadcasts now have a bitrate limit of 15MB/s.
This is set to improve the stability of prerecorded streams.
Need to reduce the bitrate of a video? See our guide here!

items.content_html:
StreamYard now supports directly sharing and embedding recordings! 📼
No need to download and re-upload recordings, you can now share or embed your stream recordings directly from StreamYard.
Here's how to Share or Embed your recordings.

items.content_html:
StreamYard now saves recordings indefinitely! 💾
Recordings are no longer deleted after 15 days, and instead are now kept indefinitely, up to a storage limit.
For more info on recording storage, see here.

Upload videos, or use past StreamYard broadcasts, and stream them live to your destinations!
Here's how to set up a pre-recorded stream.
